augments.name: Current Overload
augments.description: Riplash has 10% more range. Successful hits reduce its Cooldown by 30%.

augments.name: Brutal Chains
augments.description: Electrocute grants 8% more Movement Speed and deals 30% more damage to Monsters.

augments.name: Wanton Warden
augments.description: Regenerate Health equal to 4-7% of damage taken over 5s. Increases with Hero Level.

abilities.name: Whip
abilities.summary: Shred your enemies with devastating lashes from your chains.

abilities.name: Riplash
abilities.summary: Launch your chain forward, attaching to the first Enemy hit, dealing damage and pulling them towards you.

abilities.name: Shock Therapy
abilities.summary: Swing an electrified whip, removing shields, dealing damage and silencing enemies.

abilities.name: Electrocute
abilities.summary: Emit an electrical aura, gain movement speed and deal damage over time to enemies around you.

abilities.name: Skewer
abilities.summary: Unleash a torrent of chains, dealing damage and suppressing enemies hit. Repeat the damage at the end of the suppression.

abilities.name: Riot Shield
abilities.summary: Shield yourself after applying crowd control.

augments.name: Auto-Lock Amp
augments.description: Seek and Destroy's homing speed is increased by 25%.

augments.name: Blast Zone
augments.description: Sticky Mine's explosion radius is increased by 35%.

augments.name: Ion Barrier
augments.description: Security Gate grants Yourself and Allied Heroes a 50 (+55%) Shield for 3s when they first pass through.

abilities.name: Spark
abilities.summary: Electrify enemies with shock bolts from your generator.

abilities.name: Seek and Destroy
abilities.summary: Release an airborne droid. Upon stopping, the droid slows and deals damage over time to enemies beneath it.

abilities.name: Sticky Mine
abilities.summary: Launch a sticky mine that attaches to any nearby unit. After a delay the mine explodes, dealing damage.

abilities.name: Security Gate
abilities.summary: Throw forward an electrical gate, granting allies that pass through it decaying movement speed. If an enemy passes through, the gate deals damage and roots them.

abilities.name: Tesla Dome
abilities.summary: Unleash your Tesla Dome, dealing damage and expanding over time. This damage reduces armour and slows for a duration.

abilities.name: Field Data Accumulation
abilities.summary: Damaging Heroes and Killing Targets grants Data that permanently increases your Magical Power.

augments.name: The Rumbling
augments.description: Boulder Throw can be ripped out mid-air. It also deals 0-70% more damage, based on distance thrown (capped at 6000 units).

augments.name: Rock & Awe
augments.description: Rumble has no Cooldown, but it deals 35% less damage, costs 5 more Mana, and Slows Rampage by 60% while active.

augments.name: Tiny Titan
augments.description: Behemoth shrinks Rampage instead, granting him no Combat Penalty and 50/55/60% Total Attack Speed, but he receives 40% more damage.

abilities.name: Swipe
abilities.summary: Pulverise your enemies with your primal fists.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.summary:
Leap forward before slamming down to the ground, dealing damage.

While in Behemoth: Increase the leap range.

abilities.name: Boulder Throw
abilities.summary:
Rip a boulder from the ground. Throw the boulder, dealing damage and stunning all enemies in its path,

While in Behemoth: Throw the boulder instantly.

abilities.name: Rumble
abilities.summary:
Pound the ground with each fist, dealing damage and slowing enemies.

While in Behemoth: Cooldown is significantly reduced.

abilities.name: Behemoth
abilities.summary: Become enraged, growing in size, gaining health, and empowering your abilities for a duration.

abilities.name: King of the Jungle
abilities.summary: Gain health regeneration that is increased while in the Jungle. Being immobilised restores health and grants tenacity.

augments.name: Communion
augments.description: Mortal Coil no longer Executes but has 20% increased Radius. Ally Heroes now heal themselves upon damaging targets in its area, at 100% effectiveness.

augments.name: Vital Essence
augments.description: Picking up Essence grants <AbilityName>+4g</> and restores 3.5% Missing Health and Mana.

augments.name: Netherward
augments.description: Upon using Soulfire, gain a 40 (+40%) Shield for 2s.

abilities.name: Vow
abilities.summary: Fire bolts of chaotic energy at your foes.

abilities.name: Soulfire
abilities.summary: Spin your cane, unleashing multiple waves of chaotic energy that pierce through and damage all enemies in their path.

abilities.name: Mortal Coil
abilities.summary: Launch a Soul Orb that pulls in and damages foes. Heal yourself when damaging enemies that are caught in its area.

abilities.name: Stupor
abilities.summary: Leap into the air and fire an Orb of Deception, mesmerizing and damaging any enemies caught in its explosion.

abilities.name: Abyssal Rift
abilities.summary: Teleport to a location and summon an infernal singularity above you that repeatedly attacks all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Echoes of the Damned
abilities.summary: Renna can hover by jumping while airborne. Enemies also drop Essence when they die. Collect it to improve your abilities.

augments.name: Wild Growth
augments.description: Untamed Growth also Heals Yourself and Allies for 30 (+32%) over its duration. Healing repeats on Explosion.

augments.name: Natural Infusion
augments.description: Bramble Patch has 30% more range.

augments.name: Verdant Embrace
augments.description: Damaging Heroes with Harvest Nettles grants 10 Ability Haste for 6s, stacking infinitely.

abilities.name: Floret
abilities.summary: Fire ferocious flowers at your prey.

abilities.name: Untamed Growth
abilities.summary: Hurl a small plant that deals damage over time then explodes for even more damage.

abilities.name: Bramble Patch
abilities.summary: Summon a patch of thorny brambles, dealing damage and slowing enemies whilst speeding up allies.

abilities.name: Harvest Nettles
abilities.summary: Throw an orb of nature energy, dealing heavy damage.

abilities.name: Fly Trap
abilities.summary: Plant a magical seedling, awakening a giant fly trap that attaches itself to all nearby enemy heroes. After a brief delay, it Pulls its victims inward, dealing damage and stunning.

abilities.name: Nature's Vengeance
abilities.summary: Each time you kill an enemy, spawn an Untamed Growth on their corpse.

augments.name: Essence Nullifier
augments.description: Upon Shielding a Hero with Alacrity, reduce their Current Ability Cooldowns by 1.5s.

augments.name: Circuit Reset
augments.description: Serenity's damage also drains 10 <AbilityPowerText>(+3/4.5/6/7.5/9% Target's Current Mana)</> Mana, dealing it as true damage.

augments.name: Aerial Assistance
augments.description: Reversal Of Fortune Cleanses the Ally it is used on and grants them 1.75s of CC Immunity.

abilities.name: Orb
abilities.summary: Turn your shielding energy offensive with this ranged basic attack.

abilities.name: Alacrity
abilities.summary: Throw an orb that shields and increases attack speed and movement speed to an ally.

abilities.name: Serenity
abilities.summary: Fire a piercing bolt of energy that damages and slows all Enemies in its path.

abilities.name: Consecrated Ground
abilities.summary: Deploy a shielding bubble. After a delay the bubble explodes, dealing damage.

abilities.name: Reversal Of Fortune
abilities.summary: Grant an ally a shield and soar to their location. On arrival, damage and knock up nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Sentinel
abilities.summary: Deal additional damage with your basic attack. Shielding allies grants them this effect.

augments.name: Focal Lens
augments.description: Axiom Strike deals 90% damage, has 40% reduced cooldown and grants 50% movement speed for 1.5s when damaging Enemy Heroes.

augments.name: Kinetic Waltz
augments.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Tachyon Lance shreds their Physical Armor by 20% for 4s and reduces the cooldown by 1s.

augments.name: Limit Break: Echo
augments.description: After casting Limit Break, the cooldowns of your basic abilities in your current stance are instantly refreshed.

abilities.name: Nova Repeater/Plasma Claws
abilities.summary: Fire a fully automatic barrage with your ranged basic attack or unleash a rapid four-hit light attack chain, culminating in a powerful heavy-hitting finisher.

abilities.name: Sidewind/Talon Drive
abilities.summary:
Ranged: Thrust upwards and empower your next basic attack to fire an explosive Railshot.

Melee: Dash to a Target enemy and unleash a powerful uppercut.

abilities.name: Tachyon Lance/Axiom Strike
abilities.summary:
Ranged: Fire a laser that pierces through all enemies in its path.

Melee: Spin 4 times with your claws, then unleash a slowing lightning strike forward.

abilities.name: Zero Shift
abilities.summary:
Switch between Ranged and Melee stances, changing your abilities.
Gaining bonus Physical Power in Ranged stance and Healing when damaging enemy Heroes in Melee stance.

abilities.name: Limit Break
abilities.summary:
Ranged: Fly upwards and bombard a Target area with four energy beams.

Melee: Teleport to a location and unleash a mobile flurry of strikes, culminating in a devastating finisher from above.

abilities.name: Helios Core
abilities.summary: Damage enemy Heroes to build Heat. Upon reaching max Heat, you may activate a Limit Break ability.

augments.name: Grim Harvest
augments.description: Colossal Blow's Knock Back is 15% stronger. Each Soul Tier increases this by 25% more.

augments.name: Unholy Pursuit
augments.description: Phantom Rush grants 2 Souls when it damages a Hero. Its Cooldown also resets when Colossal Blow hits a Hero.

augments.name: Gravebreaker
augments.description: Siphon now Executes Enemies that fall below 6% Max Health.

abilities.name: The Harbinger
abilities.summary: Beat your enemies into submission with The Harbinger

abilities.name: Phantom Rush
abilities.summary: Dash forward, gliding through any Enemies in your path, dealing damage and slowing them.

abilities.name: Siphon
abilities.summary: Strike forward with a spectral hand, dealing damage. Syphon heals you based on damage dealt.

abilities.name: Subjugate
abilities.summary: Call down a miasma of dark energy, dealing damage and rooting to enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Colossal Blow
abilities.summary: Deliver a heavy blow from The Harbinger, dealing damage and sending all enemies flying.

abilities.name: Reaper of Souls
abilities.summary: Gains Souls when killing enemies with abilities. Souls grant bonus health and siphon damage, and give new effects after a set amount are gained.

augments.name: Grenadier
augments.description: Ventilate Pushes Back nearby Enemies, its force increasing the closer they are to you.

augments.name: Amplified Burst
augments.description: Vaporize has 15% more range.

augments.name: Hotshot
augments.description: Vortex Grenades has 1 additional Max Charge. Rocket Dash grants 1 charge on use.

abilities.name: LUNARI 4.0
abilities.summary: Fire a cartrige of superheated plasma from each of the LUNARI 4.0s.

abilities.name: Vortex Grenade
abilities.summary: Launch a grenade that explodes upon contact with an enemy, dealing damage and slowing.

abilities.name: Vaporize
abilities.summary: Charge and fire two superheated piercing projectiles, each dealing damage.

abilities.name: Rocket Dash
abilities.summary: Roll or dash in the direction of movement depending on if you're in the air.

abilities.name: Ventilate
abilities.summary: Set the LUNARI 4.0s to full auto, unleashing a barrage of bullets over three seconds that deals a massive amount of damage.

abilities.name: Gunslinger
abilities.summary: Casting an ability will cause your next basic attack to fire three times.

augments.name: Badlands Belch
augments.description: Belch deals an additional <HealthText>(+8/10/12% Target's Missing Health)</> damage and Knocks Back 30% further.

augments.name: Hold This!
augments.description: Molotov permanently gains +5 Explosion Damage against Heroes each time its Explosion hits one.

augments.name: Turret Maniac
augments.description: Increase your Maximum Number of Turrets to 4, but they have 20% less Health.

abilities.name: Spew
abilities.summary: Coat your enemies in oil with Scorchs flammable spit.

abilities.name: Molotov
abilities.summary: Iggy flings a Molotov that deals damage to enemies hit by the explosion. A Fire Field will remain where the explosion occurs, dealing damage over time.

abilities.name: Flame Turret
abilities.summary: Iggy throws down a turret that shoots damaging fireballs at enemies. Hitting an enemy with Spew redirects turrets to attack that target.

abilities.name: Oil Spill
abilities.summary: Scorch hurls a ball of oil that deals damage and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Inferno
abilities.summary: Scorch unleashes a cone of flame gaining movement speed and dealing damage. At the end of the duration Scorch will deal damage and knock back enemy targets within the cone.

abilities.name: Badlands Critter
abilities.summary: Basic attacks coat enemies in oil and slow them. Oiled enemies will become ignited by Iggy's fire attacks causing enemies to burn for extra damage.

augments.name: Justice's Reach
augments.description: Shots Fired now pierces units and has +300 additional range.

augments.name: Martial Law
augments.description: Murdock gains 2 additional Max Static Trap Charges and Static Traps are 20% larger.

augments.name: Sting Operation
augments.description: Long Arm Of The Law deals 12% more damage and grants <AbilityName>+50g</> on Hero Kill.

abilities.name: The Enforcer
abilities.summary: Bombard your enemies with bullets from your hip fired rifle, The Enforcer.

abilities.name: Buckshot
abilities.summary: Discharge a shotgun blast, dealing more damage the closer the enemy is and reducing their armour. The blast pushes enemies back.

abilities.name: Static Trap
abilities.summary: Place an energy trap that deals damage and roots enemy heroes.

abilities.name: Hot Pursuit
abilities.summary: Activate your sirens, gaining movement speed and attack speed.

abilities.name: Long Arm of the Law
abilities.summary: Kneel and prepare an energised sniper shot with unlimited range that can travel through anything. This shot deals massive damage.

abilities.name: Shots Fired
abilities.summary: Periodically, your next basic attack has increased range and deals more damage.

augments.name: Blood Well
augments.description: Takedowns summon a pool of blood with 18 charges for 120s. While standing in the pool, Countess consumes a charge to restore 2% Max Health and 2.5% Max Mana every 0.25s.

augments.name: Sanguine Slash
augments.description: Blade Siphon deals 20% more damage to Isolated Targets.

augments.name: Shadow Strike
augments.description: Damaging Heroes with Basic Attacks or Abilities reduces Shadow Slip's Cooldown by 6%, up to once per ability.

abilities.name: Sophia & Marie
abilities.summary: Cut through foes with your twin Chokutos Sophia and Marie.

abilities.name: Blade Siphon
abilities.summary: Spin and strike everything around you dealing damage and healing yourself for everything hit.

abilities.name: Shadow Slip
abilities.summary: Blink to a nearby enemy, dealing damage and slowing them.Leaves behind a Shadow at your original position. Re-triggering the ability will return you to the Shadow's location.

abilities.name: Eventide
abilities.summary: Send out a cloud of darkness dealing damage in its path.

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.summary: Leap to a nearby Enemy Hero, forcing them to face you, suppressing them and dealing damage. Heal for half of the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Blood Tithe
abilities.summary: Repeat ability hits on enemy heroes applies haemorrhage, dealing damage and granting Countess  movement speed and reduced cooldowns.

augments.name: Cursed Infestation
augments.description: Hive deals 15% more damage and has 10% increased range.

augments.name: Ritual Of Death
augments.description: Takedowns decrease Curse's Cooldown by 20s.

augments.name: Spirit Shred
augments.description: Morigesh's Basic Attacks Shred 3.5% Magical Armor for 4s, stacking up to 5 times.

abilities.name: Fetid Dagger
abilities.summary: Throw Fetid Daggers at your enemies.

abilities.name: Mark
abilities.summary: Deal damage to a target, restoring health and markin them if they are a Hero.

abilities.name: Hive
abilities.summary: Throw a hive of insects that explodes dealing damage and Slowing targets hit.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.summary: Become the swarm, gaining movement speed and damage reduction for a duration. Passing through enemies deals damage and restores health.

abilities.name: Curse
abilities.summary: Summon a horde of insects to stab the marked target, dealing massive damage.

abilities.name: Pestilence
abilities.summary: Your abilities apply Pestilence for a duration, dealing damage over time. This effect can spread to nearby enemies.

augments.name: Hersir's Will
augments.description: Highland Hurl can be picked up, reducing its Cooldown by 45%.

augments.name: Iron Resolve
augments.description: Wild Rush grants 35/40/45/50/70% Damage Reduction while it is Channeling.

augments.name: Axe Retrieval
augments.description: While Unstoppable Force is active, gain a stack of Hersir every 0.6s.

abilities.name: Skullsplitter
abilities.summary: Cleave through your enemies with your battleaxe, Skullsplitter.

abilities.name: Wild Rush
abilities.summary:
Dash forward dealing damage and stunning the target hit.

Empowered: Gain a shield after hitting an enemy.

abilities.name: Ruthless Assault
abilities.summary:
Spin your axe, striking all Enemies around you twice.

Empowered: Strike three times instead.

abilities.name: Highland Hurl
abilities.summary:
Throw a spectral axe, dealing damage.

Empowered: Roots enemies hit for a duration.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Force
abilities.summary: Slam your helmet down, cleansing all debuffs and granting maximum stacks instantly. Become unstoppable for the duration.

abilities.name: Hersir
abilities.summary:
Gain stacks when damaging Enemies.

At maximum stacks, Terra's next Basic Ability is Empowered with additional effects.

augments.name: Critical Override
augments.description: Kallari's Abilities can Critically Strike, but her Critical Damage is decreased by 35%.

augments.name: Execution Mandate
augments.description: Takedowns reduce Current Basic Ability Cooldowns by 45%.

augments.name: Deadly Finesse
augments.description: If Crippling Dagger hits a Hero or kills an Enemy Unit, reduce its Cooldown by 2s. Hero hits also restore 20 Mana.

abilities.name: Plasteel Swords
abilities.summary: Unleash razor sharp attacks with your ultralight Plasteel Swords.

abilities.name: Crippling Dagger
abilities.summary: Throw a dagger, dealing damage slowing enemies. Max Charges: 2.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.summary: Gain Health Regeneration out of vision. Activate to enter Camouflage and gain movement speed.

abilities.name: Shadow Dance
abilities.summary: Backflip into the sky, allowing you to dash at a target enemy and deal damage, increasing if they're affected by Death Mark.

abilities.name: Guillotine
abilities.summary: Dash forward, cutting through all Enemies in your path, dealing massive damage.

abilities.name: Death Mark
abilities.summary: Damaging enemies reveals them and deals damage after a delay. Additionally, Kallari can jump multiple times.

augments.name: Blast Off!
augments.description: Land Mine blasts Targets 30% further.

augments.name: Combat Thrusters
augments.description: Gain 40%/70%/160% Movement Speed during Make It Rain.

augments.name: Sniper Shells
augments.description: Howitzer's Basic Attacks grant him 3.5% Total Attack Speed for 4.5s, stacking up to 6 times.

abilities.name: Cannon
abilities.summary: Fire explosive shells at your enemies that deal splash damage.

abilities.name: Slow Grenades
abilities.summary: Launch a cluster of proximity mines that explode when an enemy touches them, dealing damage and slowing.

abilities.name: R2000 Missile
abilities.summary: Fire a long range rocket that explodes on impact, dealing damage.

abilities.name: Land Mine
abilities.summary: Lob a mine that can be retriggered to explode dealing damage and knocking back enemies.

abilities.name: Make It Rain
abilities.summary: Thrust up into the sky and rain down a barrage of rockets in the direction you're looking dealing massive damage.

abilities.name: Armed Salvo
abilities.summary: Periodically your basic attack deals bonus AoE damage around the Target.

augments.name: Bringer Of Mercy
augments.description: Mercy costs 10 less Mana and reduces Kira's Current Ability Cooldowns by 1s upon dealing damage.

augments.name: Siphoning Purge
augments.description: Purge Heals for 25% of its damage dealt to Heroes.

augments.name: Dusk's Embrace
augments.description: Dusk deals an additional <HealthText>(+6%/6.5%/7%/7.5%/8% Target's Missing Health)</> damage to Enemies afflicted with Max Vengeance stacks.

abilities.name: Wrath
abilities.summary: Fire lethal bolts at your prey with your hand crossbow, Wrath.

abilities.name: Mercy
abilities.summary: Equip Mercy to fire a powerful shot dealing damage. Mercy can critically strike, benefits from lifesteal, and applies on-hit effects.

abilities.name: Dusk
abilities.summary: Purify any enemies that are marked with Vengeance, dealing damage based on stacks and slowing for a duration.

abilities.name: Shadow Glide
abilities.summary: Dash in your current movement direction, and gain power for a duration.

abilities.name: Purge
abilities.summary: Unleash a torrent of arrows and bullets in an area. Enemies take damage over the duration. You can cast Shadow Glide during this window.

abilities.name: Vengeance
abilities.summary: Dealing damage applies a stack of Vengeance to enemies, increasing your damage dealt to them and empowering you.

augments.name: Feral Ambush
augments.description: Ambush's range is increased by 10%.

augments.name: Jungle Invasion
augments.description: Based on Hero Level, gain 3-17 Physical Power while in the Jungle. Increases to 6-34 in the Enemy Jungle.

augments.name: Minion Regeneration
augments.description: Spirit Regeneration also grants Health Regeneration against Minions.

abilities.name: Rage & Spirit
abilities.summary: Brutalize your foes with your primal twin axes, Rage and Spirit.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.summary: Leap to an enemy dealing damage and slowing them.

abilities.name: Unleash
abilities.summary: Gain an incredible amount of attack speed for a short duration allowing you to tear through enemies.

abilities.name: Invigorate
abilities.summary: Cleanse all debuffs and receive a burst of healing.

abilities.name: Cull
abilities.summary: Unleash a primal roar stunning and dealing damage to everything hit.

abilities.name: Spirit Regeneration
abilities.summary: Dealing damage builds up a stacking healing effect. Go too long without dealing damage and this effect ends.

augments.name: Devastating Bombs
augments.description: Void Bomb deals 15% more damage to Isolated Targets.

augments.name: Pulsefire Rounds
augments.description: Lt. Belica's Basic Attacks also deal (+8%) magical damage On-Hit.

augments.name: Combat Veteran
augments.description: Passively gain <EffectText>+0.1-2.3 Experience</> each second. Increases with Hero Level.

abilities.name: OA-S3000 SMG
abilities.summary: Send bullets down range with your OA-S3000 SMG.

abilities.name: Void Bomb
abilities.summary:
"Place a bomb that detonates after a short delay, dealing damage.

Innovation: Detonate again after a short time."

abilities.name: Seismic Assault
abilities.summary:
Slam the ground, sending forth a seismic wave that deals damage and knocks up enemies after a short duration.

Innovation: Increased stun duration.

abilities.name: Void Drone
abilities.summary:
Deploy a drone that drains enemy mana and attacks them when damaging them with an ability or if they cast an ability, dealing damage and draining their mana.

Innovation: The drone's attacks drain additional mana.

abilities.name: Neural Disruptor
abilities.summary:
Fire a piercing blast from your sidearm, dealing damage to targets, increased based on their missing mana, and silencing them. Deals missing health damage to Manaless Heroes instead.

Innovation: Resets Cooldown if an Enemy Hero is killed.

abilities.name: Innovation
abilities.summary: Your abilities gain additional strength at maximum rank. Gains increased ability haste each time you max out an ability.

augments.name: AdaptiveFortress
augments.description: Force Shield's Cooldown is 3s lower and now has 2 charges, but is reduced in size.

augments.name: Bulldozer
augments.description: While using Bull Rush, become Unstoppable and gain 25% Damage Reduction.

augments.name: Colossal Crash
augments.description: Shield Slam's has 35% longer range, its area of effect is 15% larger, and Knocks Back Enemies on impact instead.

abilities.name: Punch
abilities.summary: Beat your opponents to a pulp with your heavy hitting fists.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.summary: Swipe forward dealing damage and stunning all enemies in front of you.

abilities.name: Bull Rush
abilities.summary: Charge forward, dealing damage and sending enemies flying.

abilities.name: Force Shield
abilities.summary: Deploy a disruptive wall of energy, blocking all incoming Enemy Projectiles.

abilities.name: Shield Slam
abilities.summary: Leap into the sky and crash down at the target location to deal damage and knock up enemies.

abilities.name: Cybernetic Shell
abilities.summary: Shield yourself after remaining out of combat for a duration and gain increased defences.

augments.name: Abyssal Mantle
augments.description: Upon activating Black Hole, gain a 50 (+75%) Shield for 4s.

augments.name: Event Horizon
augments.description: Cosmic Rift deals an additional <HealthText>(+5% Target's Max Health)</> damage to Enemies in the center.

augments.name: Infinite Impact
augments.description: Void Breach has infinite range.

abilities.name: Portal Blast
abilities.summary: Fire rift bolts at your enemies.

abilities.name: Void Breach
abilities.summary: Launch forward a comet, dealing damage and slowing enemies in its path.

abilities.name: Cosmic Rift
abilities.summary: Rip down a meteor from the sky, dealing damage to enemies caught in the area of impact.

abilities.name: Torn Space
abilities.summary: Leap through a portal in spacetime, appearing at the target location.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.summary: Unleash a black hole underneath you that pulls enemies towards the centre, constantly dealing damage.

abilities.name: Cosmic Power
abilities.summary: Damaging a hero with an ability empowers your next basic attack. This attack teathers you to your target, slowing and damaging them.

augments.name: Ionic Surge
augments.description: Rocket Boots also grants Yourself and nearby Allies 30% Decaying Movement Speed over 3s.

augments.name: Momentum Boost
augments.description: Ion Strike's Stun radius is increased by 30%. Upon Stunning, it Shreds Armors by 15% for 3s.

augments.name: Photon Efficiency
augments.description: Photon Disruptor deals 10% more damage and its Cooldown is reduced by 15% when it hits a Hero.

abilities.name: The Ionizer
abilities.summary: Send an energy bolt from your staff.

abilities.name: Stasis Bomb
abilities.summary: Launch a bouncing ball of energy, dealing damage and stunning enemies.

abilities.name: Photon Disruptor
abilities.summary: Release a drone that emits a beam of energy dealing damage and slowing all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Containment Fence
abilities.summary: Deploy a circular energy fence that prevents enemies from passing through.

abilities.name: Ion Strike
abilities.summary: Summon a bot above the target location that blasts the ground dealing damage and slowing enemies. Enemies directly under the beam will be stunned.

abilities.name: Rocket Boots
abilities.summary: Jump while airborne to activate Rocket Boots, propelling you upward.

augments.name: Mystic Marksman
augments.description: Knock, Knock! deals Magical Damage instead.

augments.name: Sniper's Bounty
augments.description: Killing Blows from Knock Knock! grant <AbilityName>+6g</>, increased to <AbilityName>+40g</> for Heroes.

augments.name: Illusionist
augments.description: Surprise, Surprise! grants its effects to nearby Allied Heroes, but its Cooldown is 20% higher.

abilities.name: The Neutralizer
abilities.summary: Snipe your enemies with pinpoint precision with The Neutralizer.

abilities.name: Knock, Knock!
abilities.summary: Fire a sniper shot that pierces terrain and deals high damage. If this ability hits a marked target, deal extra damage and set the cooldown to one second.

abilities.name: Peekaboo!
abilities.summary: Launch a piercing Nanite Grenade that deals damage, slows, and marks everything hit.

abilities.name: Surprise, Surprise!
abilities.summary: Enter Camouflage and gain movement speed. Takedowns will reset the cooldown of Surprise.

abilities.name: Back It Up!
abilities.summary: Choose a nearby enemy hero and mark their location from 2s prior. After a delay they will teleport back to this location.

abilities.name: Who's There?
abilities.summary: Your Vision Item becomes a Sonar Drone that when launched will scan the surrounding area,

augments.name: Flow State
augments.description: Evade's Cooldown is 15% lower and its Cooldown resets on Takedown.

augments.name: Master Of Spears
augments.description: Spear Of Nyr's Cooldown is only 50% longer when thrown.

augments.name: The Ascended
augments.description: Gain <HealthText>+6 Health</> and <AttackDamageText>+1 Physical Power</> every minute.

abilities.name: Nyrian Spear
abilities.summary: Pierce through your enemies with the Nyrian Spear.

abilities.name: Spear of Nyr
abilities.summary: Channel to throw The Spear of Nyr, dealing damage. Tapping this ability instead instantly stabs with the spear and reduces its cooldown.

abilities.name: Barricade
abilities.summary: Unfold a shield reducing incoming damage for the duration. Upon recasting or after the duration, swing the shield dealing damage and stunning.

abilities.name: Evade
abilities.summary: Dash in your current movement direction, gaining movement speed and attack speed for a duration.

abilities.name: Coliseum
abilities.summary: Leap at an enemy hero, dealing damage and spawning a coliseum around them. Killing this enemy in the coliseum permanently grants power.

abilities.name: Gladiator
abilities.summary: Gain a stack of Gladiator when dealing damage. Stacks grant increased power. After exiting combat, stacks will restore health.

augments.name: Mana Catalyst
augments.description: Restore Mana equal to 12% of damage dealt to Heroes, reduced to 2% for Non-Heroes. Basic Attacks restore 2x more.

augments.name: Arcane Engine
augments.description: Dealing Ability Damage to Heroes grants you 1.75% Movement Speed for 1.5s, stacking infinitely - 0.15s CD.

augments.name: Synaptic Shock
augments.description: Synaptic Obliterator has 50% more range and Slows for 50% longer.

abilities.name: Arcrune Conduit
abilities.summary: Cast soul bolts with the Arcrune Conduit.

abilities.name: Particle Shredder
abilities.summary: Fire homing projectiles that deal damage from the Arcrune Conduit.

abilities.name: Dread Nova
abilities.summary: Lob an unstable orb of soul energy that deals damage and stuns.

abilities.name: Ether Crystal
abilities.summary: Summon an Ether Crystal at a target location. The Crystal will push enemies and launch allies. It deals damage and slows.

abilities.name: Synaptic Obliterator
abilities.summary: Charge up the arcrune engine to fire powerful energy beams that deal damage and slow

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.summary: Your abilities apply a stack of Disintegration causing subsequent abilities to deal extra damage.

augments.name: Disc Of Demise
augments.description: Ricochet bounces 25% further and each hit reduces its Current Cooldown by 5%, increased to 10% for Heroes.

augments.name: Heal Matrix
augments.description: Infuse now has 2 charges but heals 10% less.

augments.name: Terminal Treatment
augments.description: Refibrillator's On-Hit damage increases by 0-60%, based on Target's Missing Health.

abilities.name: Refibrillator
abilities.summary: Stop the hearts of your enemies with your repurposed medical device, The Refibrilator.

abilities.name: Infuse
abilities.summary: Fire a healing bolt at an ally that restores health.

abilities.name: Ricochet
abilities.summary: Throw an electromagnetic disk dealing damage and stunning. The disk can ricochet to multiple targets.

abilities.name: Bad Medicine
abilities.summary:
Shoot the ground to form a pool of radiation that deals damage and slows,

After a duration the radiation erupts, dealing damage and slowing.

abilities.name: Neural Regenesis
abilities.summary:
Apply cellular restructuring to yourself or an ally, granting movement speed and Revival for a duration.
If the target takes lethal damage within this time, they will Resurrect.

abilities.name: Triage Protocol
abilities.summary:
Gain a stack when damaging enemy heroes.

At maximum stacks gain movement speed.

augments.name: Death From Above
augments.description: Akeron can fire an additional web projectile from the wall once, allowing him to leap from wall to wall or to Root from the wall.

augments.name: Insatiable Hunger
augments.description: Instead of decaying over time, Hunger regenerates over time and is not gained by hitting abilities. Additionally, Awakened lasts twice as long.

augments.name: Roar of Torment
augments.description: Consume now Pushes instead of Pulls and deals 200% increased tick damage, but can no longer bite.

abilities.name: Flay
abilities.summary: Flay your enemies with sharpened claws.

abilities.name: Crushing Maw
abilities.summary: Crush enemies in your gaping maw, damaging them while sustaining yourself.

abilities.name: Hellfire
abilities.summary: Launch the Demon's Eye at foes, revealing them as it spews damaging and slowing flames.

abilities.name: Web Lash
abilities.summary: Fire a web, rooting and slowing enemies caught in it or latching yourself to a wall.

abilities.name: Consume
abilities.summary: Open your maw wide, pulling in all enemies in your path to consume those that get too close.

abilities.name: Pact of the Devourer
abilities.summary: Gain Hunger through battle and become Awakened to your true demonic power.

augments.name: Combo Crunch
augments.description: Dealing damage with Cross Crunch grants 5% Total Attack Speed for 3s, stacking up to 6 times.

augments.name: Lunge Crunch
augments.description: Forward Crunch travels 15% further.

augments.name: Falcon Crunch
augments.description: Empowered Right Crunch deals 10% increased damage and launches Crunch 4x higher when used mid-air. Its Cooldown is 30% longer when this occurs.

abilities.name: Crunch
abilities.summary: Beat down your enemies with your turbocharged fists.

abilities.name: Forward Crunch
abilities.summary:
Dash forward, dealing damage. Colliding with an enemy hero stuns.
Empowered: Dash an extended distance, Pushing Enemy Heroes along.

abilities.name: Left Crunch
abilities.summary:
Crunch swings, dealing damage.
Empowered: The damage cannot be reduced.

abilities.name: Right Crunch
abilities.summary:
Crunch jabs, dealing damage and slowing everything hit.
Empowered: Deals damage and knocks them up instead.

abilities.name: Re-Crunch
abilities.summary:
Passive: Every third basic attack or ability hit heals you.
Passive: Every third ability used will be Empowered.
Active: Repeat the last ability used.

abilities.name: Cross Crunch
abilities.summary: After casting an ability, amplifies your next basic attack to deal damage and reduce your cooldowns.

augments.name: Kindred Surge
augments.description: Essence Catalyst also restores your Linked Ally's Mana by <AbilityPowerText>(+12% Target's Missing Mana)</> over the duration.

augments.name: Final Flash
augments.description: Hyperflux grants 10% more Movement Speed and (+1.2% ) Health Regen for its duration.

augments.name: Psychic Support
augments.description: Energy Lance is 30% shorter but deals 20/30/40/50/70% more damage.

abilities.name: Pulse Bolt
abilities.summary: Fire psychic bolts at your enemies.

abilities.name: Telekinetic Link
abilities.summary: Create a link between yourself and an ally, granting both increased power. If reactivated, pull the linked ally towards you.

abilities.name: Psychic Flare
abilities.summary: Blast a flare of psychic energy around you and your linked ally, dealing damage, and reducing your Blink cooldown when hitting Heroes. Enemies facing the flair become blinded.

abilities.name: Energy Lance
abilities.summary: Channel a beam of energy dealing damage over time. Each instance progressively slows until they become rooted.

abilities.name: Hyperflux
abilities.summary: Phase overcharges herself and her linked ally, granting both increased attack speed, ability haste, and movement speed for a duration.

abilities.name: Essence Catalyst
abilities.summary: After casting an ability, restore health over time. Linked allies receive the same healing. Additionally enhances your Blink.

augments.name: Tainted Oath
augments.description: Sacred Oath applies 50% Blight to Enemies for 4.5s.

augments.name: Imperial Soul
augments.description: Stone Forged Soul deals 12% more damage and its radius is 20% larger.

augments.name: Close Cut
augments.description: Make Way deals 20% increased damage to the nearest Enemy Unit.

abilities.name: Lightbringer
abilities.summary: Cleave through enemies with your sword, Lightbringer.

abilities.name: Assault The Gates
abilities.summary: Leap forward, dealing damage upon landing.

abilities.name: Make Way
abilities.summary: Surround yourself in a fiery whirlwind that deals damage.

abilities.name: Sacred Oath
abilities.summary: Bathe your sword in holy fire to enhance your next basic attack to deal extra damage and slow enemies.

abilities.name: Stone Forged Soul
abilities.summary: Enter Stasis and restore health while slowing enemies. Then, crash down, dealing massive damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Stoicism
abilities.summary: Periodically deflect incoming basic attacks. Regenerate health and gain armor as you lose health.

augments.name: Prosperous Path
augments.description:
Body Stance: Kills grant <AbilityName>+4g</>.
Spirit Stance: Kills restore <HealthText>+2.5% Missing Health</>.

augments.name: Masterful Mimicry
augments.description: Gain 1 more Max Clone and generate a stack of Hair every 5.5s.

augments.name: From Up High
augments.description: High Impact's Height Damage is no longer capped to 1500u, now dealing more damage at greater heights.

abilities.name: Ruyi Jingu Bang
abilities.summary: Beat your opponents senseless with the iconic Gold-Banded Staff.

abilities.name: Windsurge/Force Push
abilities.summary:
Spirit: Dash forward with the wind, dealing damage.
Body: Force your enemies and clones away and deal damage.

abilities.name: Cloudwalker/Pole Vault
abilities.summary:
Spirit: Create walkable clouds beneath you.
Body: Leap in a direction and gain Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Cyclebreaker/High Impact
abilities.summary:
Spirit: Gain Damage Reduction and Stun Enemies.
Body: Slam down dealing more damage based on height.

abilities.name: 84000 Hairs
abilities.summary: Switch between Body and Spirit Stances, changing your basic abilities.

abilities.name: Somersault
abilities.summary: Wukong can jump an additional time.

augments.name: Frenzied Fighter
augments.description: Berserk has no cooldown and can remain on indefinitely while under the Health threshold.

augments.name: Betrayer's Reqiuem
augments.description: After casting an ability, Bayle gains 45% Attack Speed for one attack. Additionally, he automatically starts with the 3rd attack in his Basic Attack chain, but it always deals 25% decreased damage.

augments.name: Swift Strikes
augments.description: Kingslayer uppercuts all Enemies in an area around the initial Target. Additionally, Kingslayer's Cooldown is reduced by 15%.

abilities.name: Vigil
abilities.summary: Carve through Enemies with your massive sword.

abilities.name: Skull Crusher
abilities.summary: Smash your Enemies with a brutal slam, shattering their Armor.

abilities.name: Cursed Edge
abilities.summary: Pierce Enemies with slashes of cursed energy.

abilities.name: Dire Howl
abilities.summary: Howl a battle cry, intimidating your Enemies and growing stronger.

abilities.name: Kingslayer
abilities.summary: Isolate and relentlessly slice an Enemy to pieces.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.summary: Go berserk after tanking numerous blows, gaining a surge of power to fight back.

augments.name: Chieftan's Blink
augments.description: Reduce your Blink Cooldown by 35%.

augments.name: Lust For Blood
augments.description: Heal for 4.5-11.3% of damage dealt to Enemies afflicted with Max Bloodlust stacks. Increases with Hero Level.

augments.name: Warlord's Might
augments.description: Warlord's Challenge's duration is increased by 0.3s On-Hit, decreased to 0.15s for Non-Heroes.

abilities.name: The Chieftains Warclubs
abilities.summary: Use the Chieftains Warclubs to pulverise your enemies.

abilities.name: Double Pain
abilities.summary: Using the Chieftains Clubs cleave all enemies dealing damage.

abilities.name: Smash 'n Grab
abilities.summary: Smash the ground, sending forth a shockwave that pulls all enemies towards you, dealing damage and stunning.

abilities.name: Crush
abilities.summary: Lunge forward a short distance, uppercutting enemies and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Warlord's Challenge
abilities.summary: Slam your clubs together stunning all nearby enemies. Gain attack speed and steal power from those you hit for a duration.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.summary: Your basic attacks bleed enemies dealing damage over time and restoring health to you.

augments.name: Bites Per Minute
augments.description: Rushing Beat applies 2 stacks of Track to Heroes upon damaging them.

augments.name: Showstopper
augments.description: Upon killing a Camp Leader or Siege Minion, permanently gain <EffectText>+0.75 Ability Haste</>.

augments.name: Natural Talent
augments.description: Ability hits reduce Biting Melody's Cooldown by 1s more.

abilities.name: Kiba
abilities.summary: Dice up your enemies with your sword.

abilities.name: Rushing Beat
abilities.summary: Dash forward dealing damage to all enemies you pass through. This can be retriggered to dash a second time at no cost.

abilities.name: Line Tempo
abilities.summary: Summon a spirit wolf that runs in a straight line and passes through all enemies dealing damage.

abilities.name: Circle Rhythm
abilities.summary: Summon spirit wolves that circle you, granting a shield for a duration. The wolves deal damage over time to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: All-Kill!
abilities.summary:
Passive: Dealing damage to enemy heroes with abilities applies stacks of Track for a duration.
Active: Summon a pack of spirit wolves above heroes with Track stacks, dealing damage per spirit wolf.

abilities.name: Biting Melody
abilities.summary: Basic attacks deal additional damage. Periodically this effect deals even more damage.

augments.name: Hellfire Blast
augments.description: Revenant reloads 30% faster.

augments.name: Quickdraw
augments.description: Helllfire Rounds' Fourth Shot deals 7% more damage and ignores 30% Bonus Physical Armor.

augments.name: Spectral Bounty
augments.description: Reckoning steals 10% of the Target's Physical & Magical Power. If you kill them, gain 4 (+25% of stolen stats) permanently.

abilities.name: Fate
abilities.summary: Eviscerate your enemies with your .90 hand cannon, Fate. Holds 4 rounds, the final round will always critically strike.

abilities.name: Hellfire Rounds
abilities.summary:
Passive: Increases critical strike damage and boost Fourth Shot damage.

Active: Reload your hand cannon.

abilities.name: Obliterate
abilities.summary: Unleash ethereal missiles within a wide cone that home to a marked target or random enemies if none are marked.

abilities.name: Scar
abilities.summary: Scar the target enemy dealing damage and marking them for a duration. Marked enemies take additional damage and consumes stacks. Consuming all stacks roots the target.

abilities.name: Reckoning
abilities.summary: Revenant pulls himself and his target into the Nether Realm for a duration. Gain increased gold from kills while inside the Nether Realm.

abilities.name: Bounty Hunter
abilities.summary: Increase your power based on critical strike chance and attacks speed. Killing an enemy hero grants additional gold.

augments.name: Slayer of the Heavens
augments.description: Fury of the Heavens' Cooldown is reduced by 20s and Kwang no longer retrieves his Heavenly Blade upon Recalling.

augments.name: Aura of the Heavens
augments.description: Gain 5% Omnivamp. Nearby Allied Heroes gain 4% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Heavenly Tactician
augments.description: Strike of the Heavens deals 25% more damage and reduces Cooldowns by 25% more.

abilities.name: Heavenly Blade
abilities.summary: Electrify your foes with the Heavenly Blade.

abilities.name: Light of the Heavens
abilities.summary:
Light strikes the Heavenly Blade, dealing damage in an AoE.
If you are holding the blade, gain a shield.
If the blade is in the world, deal extra damage.

abilities.name: Judgement of the Heavens
abilities.summary: Throw the Heavenly Blade to a location to deal damage. Enemies become tethered to the blade.

abilities.name: Surge of the Heavens
abilities.summary:
Dash forward dealing damage to all enemies passed through.
If the blade is in your path, knock up and deal extra damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Fury of the Heavens
abilities.summary: Teleport to the Heavenly Blade creating a massive electrical explosion dealing massive damage to all enemies.

abilities.name: Strike of the Heavens
abilities.summary: Dealing ability damage will energise the Heavenly Blade. Whilst Energised, you gain attack speed and your basic attacks deal extra damage in an AoE around the target.

augments.name: Bring The Boom
augments.description: Rad Rounds deals 60% of its damage to nearby Enemies upon exploding.

augments.name: Shred Spree
augments.description: Shrapnel Cannon's Cooldown is reduced by 85%, but it deals 60% less damage.

augments.name: Smog Therapy
augments.description: While standing in Gag Grenade, Yourself and Allied Heroes restore for 60/105/150/195/240 (+120%)(+120%) Health over its lifetime.

abilities.name: Lucy
abilities.summary: Tear through your enemies with your .45, Lucy.

abilities.name: Old Rusty
abilities.summary: Throw a boomerang, dealing damage and slowing enemies. Repeat the effect when returning.

abilities.name: Gag Grenade
abilities.summary: Toss a tear gas grenade that explodes dealing damage over time and silencing enemies.

abilities.name: Rad Rounds
abilities.summary: Load Lucy with radioactive rounds causing a buildup in enemies that deals damage after a duration.

abilities.name: Shrapnel Cannon
abilities.summary: Unleash a blast of shrapnel, dealing damage and reducing enemy armour. This attack when used In-Air sends you flying backwards.

abilities.name: Wastelander
abilities.summary: Critical strikes and ability hits apply a bleed to enemies.

augments.name: Apex Hunter
augments.description: While Tesseract Core is active, gain 18% increased Armors.

augments.name: Savage Shred
augments.description: Detection Protocol's Mark Shreds 40% Physical Armor for 5s when consumed.

augments.name: Bolster Bearicade
augments.description: Chrono Swipe deals 70% more damage to Heroes below 20% Max Health.

abilities.name: Maul
abilities.summary: Maul your foes with your mechanized Claws.

abilities.name: Chrono Swipe
abilities.summary: Lunge forward and swipe all Enemies in your path twice.

abilities.name: Detection Protocol
abilities.summary: Sniff the air, marking an enemy hero and generating a movement enhancing Scent Trail to them. Damaging the marked target slows them and grants you a Canister.

abilities.name: Primeval Roar
abilities.summary: Generate a defensive barrier, granting you damage reduction. After the duration or upon reactivation, it explodes, damaging and causing all nearby enemies to run away in fear.

abilities.name: Ursine Burst
abilities.summary: Dash forward, grabbing the first enemy hero you collide with. Then leap into the air and slam them into the ground, damaging and slowing all enemies in the landing zone.

abilities.name: Tesseract Device
abilities.summary: Every second basic attack on-hit generates a Canister. Canisters give bonus attack speed and healing on-hit. At max Canisters, unleash your Tesseract Core, gaining additional on-hit damage and healing.

augments.name: Soul Weaver
augments.description: Soul Storm grants 20% <EffectText>(+5% per Hero Hit)</> Damage Reduction while active, and its Cooldown is 8% lower.

augments.name: Hallowed Reverberation
augments.description: Hallowed Strikes gains 150 additional range and bounces 2 more times.

augments.name: Ephemeral Surge
augments.description: Destroying Torn Spirits restores 5% of your Maximum Mana and grants 35% Decaying Movement Speed over 2.5s.

abilities.name: Kokoroken
abilities.summary: Slice through foes, Body and Spirit.

abilities.name: Whispering Echoes
abilities.summary: Hurl three exploding Kunai that mark targets for Severance.

abilities.name: Anima Burst
abilities.summary: Perform a spinning kick to unleash souls, damaging, marking nearby enemies and healing you if they are a hero or monster. Casting in-air will cause you to leap upwards.

abilities.name: Severance
abilities.summary: Rush forwards cutting through enemies in your path. If marked, their spirit is seperated, sharing damage dealt to it back to its host.

abilities.name: Soulstorm
abilities.summary: Unleash a storm of souls, damaging and slowing nearby enemies before pulling them towards you, tearing their spirits from their body. Then perform a final downwards slash to strike all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Hallowed Strikes
abilities.summary: After casting an ability, empower your blade for your next two attacks to launch soul wave projectiles that deal bonus damage and bounce between foes.

augments.name: Crushing Descent
augments.description: Ascend now Stuns for 0.25s when it deals damage.

augments.name: Vital Resonance
augments.description: Fallen Grace's Visages restore (+170%) Health on pick-up.

augments.name: Wrath Unleashed
augments.description: Serath gains 20/25/30% Critical Chance while Heresy is active.

abilities.name: The Nephilim
abilities.summary: Beat your foes into submission with your mace, The Nephilim.

abilities.name: Chastise
abilities.summary: Clap your wings in front of you dealing damage and slowing. Cast speed increases with attack speed.

abilities.name: Heaven's Fury
abilities.summary: Mark a target and vanish, striking enemies at their location. Each strike deals damage. Then, teleport to the marked enemy's location.

abilities.name: Ascend
abilities.summary: Rise up into the air and hover while targetting an area. Then, dive down and deal damage.

abilities.name: Heresy
abilities.summary: Take on your demonic form, dealing damage to nearby enemies and setting them ablaze. Gain movement speed, attack speed, and damage over time on your basic attacks.

abilities.name: Fallen Grace
abilities.summary: Takedowns on heroes leave behind an orb. Upon touching it, activate Heresy and reduce your current basic ability cooldowns.

augments.name: Storm of Salvation
augments.description: Deflecting a projectile grants 20% Decaying Movement Speed over 2s and a 44-350 Shield for 3s.

augments.name: Energy Transfer
augments.description: Windburn lasts for 1s longer and grants <HealthText>(+1% Missing Health)</> Healing On-Hit while active. Healing is 15% effective against Non-Heroes.

augments.name: Serpent's Blessing
augments.description: Lash Kick's Cooldown is reduced by 50% when used on Terrain.

abilities.name: Silksong
abilities.summary: Your whip sings through the air, a graceful extension of your will, striking with honed precision.

abilities.name: Backlash
abilities.summary: Master the art of deflection by redirecting enemy projectiles and dealing damage to nearby enemies that pushes them back.

abilities.name: Lash Kick
abilities.summary: With a flick, your whip becomes a tether, propelling you towards an enemy target or terrain.

abilities.name: Windburn
abilities.summary: Channel the wind's fury, extending your whip's reach and gaining the ability to cleave through multiple enemies with increased force.

abilities.name: Quelling Gale
abilities.summary: Summon a raging vortex that ensnares and halts enemy projectiles, slows them down and grants you increased movement speed.

abilities.name: Rising Storm
abilities.summary: Dealing damage builds up stacking attack speed. Go too long without dealing damage and this effect ends.

augments.name: Endless Hunt
augments.description: Takedowns reset Sparrow's Basic Ability Cooldowns and permanently grant 1 Physical Penetration.

augments.name: Veiled Stalker
augments.description: Upon activating Heightened Senses, Sparrow enters Stealth and gains 30% Movement Speed for 1.5s.

augments.name: Inner Fury
augments.description: Inner Fire now releases a fan of 5 arrows, has 8% more range, and fires 2 more volleys.

abilities.name: Heartpiercer
abilities.summary: Fire precision arrows at your enemies with your bow, Heartpiercer.

abilities.name: Piercing Shot
abilities.summary: Charge a long range terrain piercing arrow that deals damage to all enemies in its path.

abilities.name: Hail of Arrows
abilities.summary: Release a storm of arrows that rain down, dealing damage and slowing all enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Heightened Senses
abilities.summary: Focus your mind, gaining attack speed for a duration. Every second basic attack against the same target will deal increased damage.

abilities.name: Inner Fire
abilities.summary: Invoke your blazing spirit, augmenting Heartpiercer to release a fan of piercing arrows over a short duration.

abilities.name: Relentless
abilities.summary: Dealing damage applies stacks of Relentless to enemy targets. Deal additional damage to enemies with Relentless stacks.

augments.name: Instant Reload
augments.description: GTFO now Executes Heroes that fall below 5% Max Health. When this occurs, GTFO may be re-cast for 8s.

augments.name: Reboot.exe
augments.description: Triggering Pulsefire reduces your Current Basic Ability Cooldowns by 10%, increased to 25% against Heroes.

augments.name: System Restore
augments.description: Blocking an Ability with Energy Shield restores 20 (+10%) Health and grants 20% Decaying Movement Speed over 2s.

abilities.name: The Inverter
abilities.summary: Fire deadly bolts of electricity at your enemies with The Inverter.

abilities.name: Energy Shield
abilities.summary: Activate a shield that blocks the next enemy ability.

abilities.name: Displacement Blast
abilities.summary:
Fire an empowered shot forward that deals damage.
In Assault Mode, the shot displaces enemies.

abilities.name: Assault Mode
abilities.summary:
Swap between Assault and Sentry Mode.
Sentry: Basic Attacks restore mana.
Assault: Basic Attacks cost mana, deal extra damage, and slow.

abilities.name: GTFO
abilities.summary: Lock onto an enemy hero and launch an orb that passes through all terrain dealing massive damage.

abilities.name: Pulsefire
abilities.summary: Your basic attacks and abilities apply Pulsefire to Enemies. The next basic attack or ability will burst the Pulsefire dealing damage.

augments.name: Imperial Duelist
augments.description: Your Basic Attacks debuff Targets for 3s. Against debuffed Targets, deal 5% more damage and take 5% less damage.

augments.name: Ichorous Glaive
augments.description: Killing Enemy Units restores 3.5% of Missing Health, increased to 35% for Earth Shatter Executions.

augments.name: Seismic Smash
augments.description: Earth Shatter also Knocks Up Enemies and Stuns for a short duration.

abilities.name: Windwalker
abilities.summary: Slice through enemies with your glaive, Windwalker.

abilities.name: Reaping Dash
abilities.summary: Teleport forward, dealing damage to everything in your path.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.summary: Envelop yourself with a Spellshield that blocks the next ability hit and grants you additional power and movement speed.

abilities.name: Hamstring
abilities.summary: Spin twice, dealing damage and slowing all enemies around you. Isolated targets take more damage.

abilities.name: Earth Shatter
abilities.summary: Slam the ground, causing massive spikes to rise up. This deals damage and executes any enemy below the threshold.

abilities.name: Executioners Path
abilities.summary: Unique Hero Takedowns permanently grant physical power.

augments.name: Contagioned Eclipse
augments.description: Eclipse applies Contagion to all Heroes on activation.

augments.name: Nightmare Extractor
augments.description: Casting an Ability reduces the Cooldown of Extract by 20%.

augments.name: Dreadful Roots
augments.description: If Abduct hits Terrain, Mourn pulls himself towards it.

abilities.name: Clobber
abilities.summary: Bludgeon enemies with your wooden fist.

abilities.name: Abduct
abilities.summary: Wind up powerful vines that launch forward, damaging and pulling the first unfortunate enemy target hit towards you.

abilities.name: Contagion
abilities.summary: Vomit bugs that heal and protect Allied Heroes whilst damaging and shredding Enemies.

abilities.name: Beguile
abilities.summary: Channel energy, slowing yourself but gaining damage reduction. After the duration or upon reactivation, damage and mesmerize nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.summary: Absorb all light from the galaxy, preventing Enemy Heroes from seeing beyond a small radius and granting yourself movement speed for the duration.

abilities.name: Extract
abilities.summary: Swipe with a magical vine that damages enemies, absorbing their essence, healing Mourn.

augments.name: Ferocious Flight
augments.description: For each Enemy hit by Maco Fly, Maco gains 30/50/70/90/110 (+12.5%)(+1.5%) additional Shielding and the ability's Cooldown is reduced by 1s. This effect also occurs on non-Heroes, but is reduced by 80%.

augments.name: Longshot
augments.description: Maco Sparkle's damage scales linearly based on how far it travels from 100% to 200% damage.

augments.name: Shatterbloom
augments.description: Maco Strike creates a Healing field at the explosion location that Heals 15/25/35 (+4%) every 0.25s for 5s.

abilities.name: Ta-da!
abilities.summary: Fling small gemstones at Enemies, gaining stacks per successful hit. At max stacks, spend them to reduce the cooldown of your next ability.

abilities.name: Maco Sparkle!
abilities.summary: Throw a slow, explosive gemstone to damage and Stun Enemies. Can be reactivated early.

abilities.name: Maco Gift!
abilities.summary: Lob a gemstone that damages Enemies and Heals Allies, additionally granting them Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Maco Fly!
abilities.summary: Leap high into the air and crush enemies with your giant gem, damaging and Slowing Enemies. Gain a Shield for hitting Enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Maco Strike!
abilities.summary: Charge up and send a giant gemstone flying, damaging and Pushing Enemy Heroes. The gemstone then explodes, damaging and Stunning in an area.

abilities.name: Mach Speed!
abilities.summary: Gain Movement Speed while moving, gaining Slow Immunity at max stacks. Stacks removed on being hit by an Enemy Hero.

augments.name: Deep Freeze
augments.description: Cryoseism's area of effect is 20% larger.

augments.name: Frozen Fury
augments.description: Frost Storm grants 10-34% Attack Speed while active. Increases with Hero Level.

augments.name: Ice Age
augments.description: Glacial Charge travels 25% further.

abilities.name: Shatter
abilities.summary: Slice through your enemies with your sword, Shatter.

abilities.name: Boreal Sweep
abilities.summary: Summon a wave of frost dealing damage and slowing. The frost then explodes, dealing damage again.

abilities.name: Glacial Charge
abilities.summary: Dash forward and leave behind a trail of ice that increases allied movement speed.

abilities.name: Hoarfrost
abilities.summary: Create a ring of frost that deals damage and roots enemies.

abilities.name: Cryoseism
abilities.summary: Freezes an area slowing enemies. After the slow enemies explode dealing damage and chaining the effect to those hit.

abilities.name: Frozen Simulacrum
abilities.summary:
Jump whilst airborne to leap in the direction of motion, leaving behind a Statue.

Damaging enemies summons a Frost Storm that deals damage.

augments.name: Suppressive Fire
augments.description: Atomiser fires 3 blasts in succession, each dealing 60% of the original damage.

augments.name: Plasma Barrage
augments.description: Plasma Grenade reduces its own Cooldown by 3.5s when attaching to an Enemy Hero.

augments.name: Atomised Artillery
augments.description: While Air Assault is active, Basic Attack range is increased by 12%.

abilities.name: Starfire
abilities.summary: Ignite the battlefield with Starfire's celestial fury.

abilities.name: Hypercharge
abilities.summary: Hypercharge Starfire to instead project a beam that deals massive single target damage.

abilities.name: Plasma Grenade
abilities.summary: Launch a sticky grenade that detonates, slowing and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Air Assault
abilities.summary: Launch yourself upwards to fly and launch missiles at targets you damage.

abilities.name: Atomiser
abilities.summary: Charge and unleash a nuclear projectile that deals massive damage at long range.

abilities.name: Dissonance
abilities.summary: Jump higher and cause explosions on killing enemies.

augments.name: Berserker Beat
augments.description: March also grants Allies 15/20/25/30/35% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Percussive Tear
augments.description: Each hit of Crash Bang Boom! Shreds 2.5% Armors for 3s.

augments.name: Rhythmic Recharge
augments.description: Narbash restores Mana equal to 12% of damage received.

abilities.name: Drumclubs
abilities.summary: Beat your opponents like a drum with your Drumclubs.

abilities.name: Thunk
abilities.summary: Toss a Drumclub that deals damage and stuns. The damage is increased per Rhythm stack.

abilities.name: March!
abilities.summary: Bellow out a rallying war cry, granting yourself and nearby allies movement speed for a duration. The duration increases with Rhythm stacks.

abilities.name: Song Of My People
abilities.summary: Toggle: Play a soothing beat to heal yourself and nearby allies. Healing is increased with Rhythm stacks.

abilities.name: Crash Bang Boom!
abilities.summary: Channel a drum solo and gain damage reduction. Slow and damage enemies over time. When the effect ends, knock up all enemies.

abilities.name: Beatdrop
abilities.summary: Your basic attacks and abilities generate stacks of Rhythm that grant physical power and improve your abilities.
